thread.title: Mixed Report Card For New Harvard Investment Chief
thread.title_full: Mixed Report Card For New Harvard Investment Chief - WSJ

author: Timothy W. Martin
title: Mixed Report Card For New Harvard Investment Chief
text:
Stephen Blyth earned a 5.8% return on his first report card as Harvard University’s endowment chief but said the world’s wealthiest university still likely trails some of its elite rivals.
Harvard’s performance for the year ending June 30 beat internal goals, long considered an important yardstick for the endowment, as well as a broad industry benchmark. It lifted the endowment’s assets to $37.6 billion, an all-time high.
But...
